channel.title: More VPS Questions
channel.description:
Hey guys im planning on buying a vps and i need to know some questions.
#1 Do you run the server off the computer or on the vps the only reason im getting this is because my server is alot most of the time and i dont like keeping it on to run the source. so does the vps run your source thanks.
#2 Can someone tell me how many players 64MB Ram Vps will hold and a 128Mb Ram will hold.
#3 Can anyone tell me any trusted VPS sites im looking for somthing around 1-20 dollars a month

item.title: More VPS Questions
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

Which the $18 one is quite laggy. Even with like 10 players online. So I wouldn’t recommend it.

Read full topic

item.title: More VPS Questions
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“dannydude8, post:1, topic:328790”]Hey guys im planning on buying a vps and i need to know some questions.

#1 Do you run the server off the computer or on the vps the only reason im getting this is because my server is alot most of the time and i dont like keeping it on to run the source. so does the vps run your source thanks.

#2 Can someone tell me how many players 64MB Ram Vps will hold and a 128Mb Ram will hold.

#3 Can anyone tell me any trusted VPS sites im looking for somthing around 1-20 dollars a month[/quote]

#1 - The VPS will run the server 24/7, however any glitches that shut down your server will have to be reset manually or with a server restarter.

#2 - I’m not really sure what your asking, but 64MB of ram sounds like it would hold barely anyone…most people buy a VPS with 2GB+.

#3 -Just use Google. People have also posted them around here before, most likely in the general discussion section.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=search;advanced

I usually don’t allow VPS questions in this section, but since I have missed a few I will let this one slide.

Read full topic
